release_notes:
Initial beta release of Rook Survey Tools.

12 professional tools included:
• Closure & Area - Traverse calculations with live plotting
• COGO - Command-line coordinate geometry
• RINEX Tools - Convert, merge, split, decimate
• NGS/OPUS Comparison - Compare solutions
• Curve Calculator - All curve elements
• Unit Conversion - Length, area, angles
• And 6 more!

This is a beta release. Please report any bugs or feedback to feedback@rooksurveytools.com
